assertion: The police once surrounded my house after I set off an alarm in my bikini bottoms.
I once sneezed so hard in my car I set off the airbag.
When he was a baby, I used to pull him out of a top hat.
I have brewed three award-winning beers with him.
One Sunday, the two of us spend three hours trapped in an automatic car wash.
Following advice from Chris Rea, I always crack an egg into my bath.
